name: Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V

participants.name: Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V
participants.committee_id: ~{"name": "Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V"}

agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V TIME & DATE: 7:30 AM, Wednesday, February 13, 2019 PLACE: JHR 110 CHAIR: Rep. Oscar Longoria The subcommittee on Articles I, IV, and V will meet to hear testimony on House Budget recommendations for the following agencies: · Comptroller of Public Accounts and Fiscal Programs · Office of the Attorney General · Cancer Prevention and Research Institute of Texas · Texas Ethics Commission · Department of Information Resources · Texas State Library and Archives Commission · Preservation Board · State Office of Risk Management · Texas Veterans Commission Please note room change. Public testimony will be taken and may be limited to five minutes. Agenda items not considered during this hearing may be carried over to a future schedule. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
